text: José Carlos Rodrigues Pereira (born 28 July 1952, in Santa Cruz, Madeira, Portugal) is the president of Portuguese association football club C.S. Marítimo.Club Sport Marítimo; at Zerozerofootball A businessman by profession, Pereira took over the reins of C.S. Marítimo on 4 July 1997, when he was elected to replace the previous chairman Rui Fontes. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:C.S. Marítimo Category:Portuguese football chairmen and investors
title: Carlos Pereira (businessman)
